name: Outbid
description:
Bid on valuable relics against your friends to build the most valuable collection in this casual card game! Play against computer opponents offline or hop online and challenge your friends and family.

  • Bid on dozens of relics with a variety of effects and abilities that can change the course of the game
  • Play online against up to 3 friends with fully customizable rules
  • Select 1 of 4 auction lots or create your own with custom relics
